name: fundamental-styles
description: Fundamental Styles is a Design System and HTML/CSS Component Library used to build modern Product User Experiences with the SAP look and feel. Learn more about this project at - http://sap.github.io/fundamental-styles/

scripts.build: npm run style:remove && npm run style:compile && npm run style:postCSS && npm run style:assets
scripts.docs:compile: npm run build && npm run docs:config; cp dist/fundamental-styles.css docs/css
scripts.docs:prod: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml,_config-prod.yml && cd ..
scripts.docs: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml && cd ..
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && npm run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.start: npm run docs:compile && cd docs && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental --config _config.yml,_config-library.yml
scripts.style:remove: if [ -d dist/ ]; then rm -rf dist/; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:linux-fix && server-test start:playground http-get://localhost:3030 test:visual
scripts.test:update: npm run test:linux-fix && server-test start:playground http-get://localhost:3030 test:reference && backstop approve --config ./test/visual-regression-tests/config/backstopConfig.js
scripts.test:update-linux: npm run test:linux-fix && server-test start:playground http-get://localhost:3030 test:reference && sudo chown -R ${USER}:${USER} . && backstop approve --config ./test/visual-regression-tests/config/backstopConfig.js
